name: White Rabbit
description: A small rabbit found hopping around peaceful islands. Quick but harmless.

name: Wild Boar
description: A ferocious forest creature that charges intruders with brute strength.

name: Sea Wolf
description: A predator with sharp fangs and keen senses, often found in cold island regions.

name: Arctic Bear
description: A massive bear known for its thick fur and devastating paw strikes.

name: Desert Falcon
description: Swift and deadly from above, this bird dives at lightning speed to snatch prey.

name: Sea King
description: A colossal sea creature that rules the depths. Few pirates live to tell the tale.

name: Great Shark
description: A vicious predator of the ocean, drawn to the scent of battle and blood.

name: Savannah Lion
description: King of the plains â€” courageous and relentless in combat.

name: Dragon Turtle
description: A legendary hybrid beast with scales like steel and breath of flame.

name: Fire Phoenix
description: A mythical bird reborn from flames. Said to bless those who witness its fire.

name: Giant Gorilla
description: A massive and powerful primate with unmatched raw strength.

name: Deep-Sea Octopus
description: Smart and slippery, it can vanish into ink clouds to escape danger.

name: Fire Fox
description: A cunning creature surrounded by glowing embers and fiery tails.

name: Mountain Elk
description: A calm forest animal, admired for its majestic antlers and endurance.

name: Armored Giant Crab
description: A monstrous crab with a shell so tough it can block cannonballs.
